english.segment1: I thought that i would not survive. I came this close to losing my mind. Sometimes you go through things in life. That makes you say 'Lord, why me this time?
english.segment2: But he's so faithful. He keeps making ways out of no way. Just when i thought that i couldn't take no more. I MADE IT THROUGH
english.segment3: So many nights i had to cry. So many storm clouds, i lost sight. I felt like giving up the fight. Never thought i would see daylight
english.segment4: But he's so faithful. He keeps making ways out of no way. Just when i thought that i couldn't take no more. I MADE IT. I MADE IT THROUGH. I MADE IT, MADE IT. MADE IT THROUGH. MADE IT. OH, OH, OH, OH, OH, OH
english.segment5: I MADE IT, MADE IT. MADE IT THROUGH. OH, OH, OH, OH, OH, OH
english.segment6: STILL STANDING, I MADE IT. STILL STANDING, I MADE IT. STILL PRAISING, I MADE IT. STILL DANCING, I MADE IT. OH, OH, OH, OH, OH, OH
english.segment7: STILL STANDING, I MADE IT. STILL CLAPPING, I MADE IT. STILL DANCING, I MADE IT. STILL DANCING, I MADE IT. OH, OH, OH, OH, OH, OH
